parameter.name: lower
parameter.label: Lower Bound
parameter.description: Maps to OFF if value is below lower bound (plain number or number with unit).

parameter.name: upper
parameter.label: Upper Bound
parameter.description: Maps to ON if value is above upper bound (plain number or number with unit).

parameter.name: inverted
parameter.label: Inverted
parameter.description: Inverts resulting mapping of ON / OFF, if true.
